pages.text: And surely, indeed We sent to Samud (people) their brother Salih, (saying) that: “Pay obedience to Allah.” Then when they (broke up into) two sects, they quarrel among each other
He said: “O my nation! Why do you hasten in evil before good? Why don’t you ask Allah for forgiveness so that you: you may be showered mercy
They said: “We augured ill omen from you and whoever is with you.” He said: “Your (belief about) ill omen is (under record) with Allah; nay, you are a people put under test and trial.”
And there were in the city nine bands of men: they create mischief in the land and do not indulge in (any) reform

They said : " Swear one to another by Allah that we shall make a secret night attack on him and his household; afterwards we will surely say to his heir-attorney: ‘We witnessed not the slaying place of his household and verily, we are surely those who tell the truth
And they devised a plot and We planned an stratagem while they perceive (it) not
Then see how was the final end of their plot — that We destroyed them and their nation, all together
So these are their houses in utter ruin as they transgressed. Surely, in this is indeed a lesson for a nation who know
And We rescued those who Believed and used to obey (Allah)
And (bring to mind) Lout when he said to his nation: “Do you indulge in Al-Fahisha while you see (the evil aspect thereof)
Is it (that) surely you people indeed approach men in sexual lust instead of women? Nay, you are a nation: you behave senselessly
